channel.title: Just a Quick Question about Servers
channel.description:
Hey Guys, so I have been running around the web for awhile now and I still can't get anything right, I started off looking for a server I can download or make and use it on my laptop offline and it is just me in the world with all the bosses and item spawning, all that good stuff. Just basically runescape as is now that is offline for me to do whatever I want. But I haven't been able to find anything, I was trying some of the servers in the Server Download section and I couldn't get any of them to work so i am at my wits end lol, so hopefully you guys can just point me in the right direction here. sorry if this is in thie wrong section :(
thanks for the help guys Brad
